newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - May 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - May 20.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on May 20:
NEW YORK - The Treasury Department announced far-reaching rules that will directly regulate thousands of businesses that wire money outside the country.
MILWAUKEE - This thriving blue collar community where the unemployment rate has been below four percent for more than two years is challenging the Federal Reserve's assumptions about inflation.
WASHINGTON - A federal agency has postponed a vote on the design and site of a new center in downtown Washington.
WASHINGTON - The Federal Trade Commission began a hearing on one of the most contentious antitrust matters in years -- the proposed merger of Staples Inc and Office Depot Inc.
